issue.title: [Rust] Compute nested definition and repetition for list arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10766](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10766). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This extends on ARROW-9728 by only focusing on list array repetition and definition levels
